feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(tables): introduce the future of no-code automation database (#6597) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • fix(dust): update Dust error format after API change (#7089) @AdamSelene
  • fix: support duplicate query params for arrays (#7072) @danielpoonwj
  • feat(slack): new command trigger and get file action (#7080) @geekyme
  • feat: add Metabase get dashboard questions action (#7068) @valentin-mourtialon

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: check if jwt expired in current user (#7099) @abuaboud
  • fix: progress bar value usage limits (#7091) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: allow to manual override notify status for embed users (#7096) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove icons from sidebar and show docs flag (#7090) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: make some improvements to the sidebar styling (#7083) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: allow deleting single tables + introduce actions menu in /tables route (#7086) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add danielpoonwj as a contributor for code (#7084) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @danielpoonwj, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @valentin-mourtialon

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.1
entry.content:
üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade react-syntax-highlighter from 5.8.0 to 15.4.2 (#7104) @abuaboud
  • fix: upgrade all deps (#7103) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: stop UI from crashing on login for community edition (#7111) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: add back license key link in platform admin dashboard (#7108) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(tables): common formatRecord (#7109) @amrdb

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud and @amrdb

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.4
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(Tables): added ability to rename fields (#7142) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • fix(hubspot): convert checkbox property to static dropdown (#7138) @kishanprmr
  • feat(pieces): Add Chainalysis Screening API integration piece (#6951) @ahmad-swanblocks
  • feat(slack): retrieve slack thread messages action (#7129) @flex-yeongeun
  • feat: new google slide piece (#7128) @Kevinyu-alan
  • fix(onedrive): fix download file and list files action (#7047) @kishanprmr
  • fix: image to pdf extension check (#7127) @danielpoonwj

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: stop redirecting to sign in page, if user was deleted and refreshed in embedding mode (#7134) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore(deps): bump tj-actions/changed-files from 44 to 46 in /.github/workflows (#7130) @dependabot

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @ahmad-swanblocks, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @danielpoonwj, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @flex-yeongeun, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr
